hibernate-mapping.query: select dataListMetadata.rootEntityId from edu.wustl.cab2b.common.domain.DataListMetadata dataListMetadata where dataListMetadata.id = ?
select experiement from Experiment experiement join experiement.dataListMetadataCollection dataListMetadata where dataListMetadata.id = ? and experiement.userId = ?
from edu.wustl.cab2b.common.queryengine.Cab2bQuery cab2bQuery where cab2bQuery.userId = (Select user.userId from edu.wustl.cab2b.common.user.User user where user.userName = ?)
from edu.wustl.cab2b.common.domain.Experiment Exp where Exp.userId = (Select user.userId from edu.wustl.cab2b.common.user.User user where user.userName = ?) order by Exp.lastUpdatedOn

from edu.wustl.cab2b.common.domain.ExperimentGroup as ExpGrp where ExpGrp.parentGroup.id is null and ExpGrp.userId = (Select user.userId from edu.wustl.cab2b.common.user.User user where user.userName = ?)
